Helsinki.name: Kruununhaka
Helsinki.description: Historic center with Senate Square, Cathedral, and Government Palace

Helsinki.name: Kallio
Helsinki.description: Trendy working-class district with bars, rock venues, and hipster cafes

Helsinki.name: Punavuori
Helsinki.description: Design district with boutiques, galleries, and Helsinki Design Museum

Helsinki.name: Ullanlinna
Helsinki.description: Upscale Art Nouveau area with Kaivopuisto park and sea views

Helsinki.name: Töölö
Helsinki.description: Cultural district with Finlandia Hall, National Museum, and Temppeliaukio Church

Helsinki.name: Katajanokka
Helsinki.description: Peninsula with Uspenski Cathedral, icebreakers, and waterfront restaurants
